雨.definition: (literary) to rain; (of rain, snow etc) to fall; to precipitate; to wet

雨城.definition: Yucheng district of Ya'an city 雅安市[Ya3 an1 shi4], Sichuan

雨城區.definition: Yucheng district of Ya'an city 雅安市[Ya3 an1 shi4], Sichuan

雨夾雪.definition: sleet; mixture of snow and rain

雨女無瓜.definition: (neologism) (slang) it's none of your business (imitation of an accented pronunciation of 與你無關|与你无关[yu3 ni3 wu2guan1])

雨山.definition: Yushan, a district of Ma'anshan City 馬鞍山市|马鞍山市[Ma3an1shan1 Shi4], Anhui

雨山區.definition: Yushan, a district of Ma'anshan City 馬鞍山市|马鞍山市[Ma3an1shan1 Shi4], Anhui

雨後春筍.definition: lit. after rain, the spring bamboo (idiom); fig. rapid new growth; many new things emerge in rapid succession

雨湖.definition: Yuhu district of Xiangtan city 湘潭市[Xiang1 tan2 shi4], Hunan

雨湖區.definition: Yuhu district of Xiangtan city 湘潭市[Xiang1 tan2 shi4], Hunan

雨花.definition: Yuhua district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan

雨花區.definition: Yuhua district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan

雨花臺.definition: Yuhuatai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

雨花臺區.definition: Yuhuatai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

雨過天晴.definition: sky clears after rain; new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom); every cloud has a silver lining (idiom); see also 雨過天青|雨过天青[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing1]

雨過天青.definition: sky clears after rain; new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom); every cloud has a silver lining (idiom); see also 雨過天晴|雨过天晴[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing2]

雨靴.definition: rain boots; rubber boots; CL:雙|双[shuang1]
